title: Alien Cityscape by Joebert Zaide
author: Joebert Zaide
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Alien Cityscape by Joebert Zaide
text:
Cover Art
 Alien Cityscape
 Joebert is in his senior year and majoring in Visual Communication. For most of his career, he has worked with traditional mediums and only started working with digital paintings in 2006. His passions lead him to create works of art that feature various science fiction and fantasy worlds and the beings that inhabit them.
